root.name: Encounter
root.description: PlotEnemy ships have destroyed the players' home planet, but the player was able to escape in a fighter ship before the destruction. Now in order to get revenge the player must reach and destroy the enemies base.GameplayEncounter is a vertical scrolling shooterEncounter is a vertical scrolling space shooter. The player's space ship is fixed at the bottom of the screen, but can move left and right. There are enemy ships and asteroids that can be shot at and destroyed to gain points. However, if the ship comes in contact with an asteroid or is shot by an enemy ship one life is lost from the initial 3 the player starts with. There is also a fuel meter which steadily decreases as time goes on, when it is fully depleted the player loses a life.
